ygData.subject: Re: Comments thoughts petitions -LONG-
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Which you can t do anymore because for some strange reason they made a bunch of quest items (including heads) no-drop no-trade no-bank. -- John H. Kim
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 9 Aug 1999, Roop Dirump wrote:
>
> The level 14 song DOES have a purpose. With many lore items, and even a few
> non-lore items you receive a message about the item. For instance, one ogre
> I happened upon once mentioned someone had given him a human head as a gift,
> and he wished to know whose it was. With that song I was able to tell him
> the name of the disgusting little pet head he carried around with him. The

Which you can't do anymore because for some strange reason
they made a bunch of quest items (including heads) no-drop
no-trade no-bank.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
